title: Racing Let’s Play?
detail_text: <:th_ch0209/>You want to play this game.... on your channel?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0109/>That’s right. Racing around in animal cars is so cute, right? But Ruby is worried if Ruby could talk while playing or not.... So Ruby wants to learn from you, Rina-chan.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0209/>Yoshiko-chan also livestream games. Why didn’t you ask her instead?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0109/>The games that Yoshiko-chan likes are of a different genre from what Ruby wants to play, so....<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0209/>I see.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0109/>You play lots of different games, right, Rina-chan? You said that you played a cute mobile game with Ayumu-san, so Ruby thought you might be good at this sort of game too. Please teach me!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0209/>Of course, leave it to me. Rina-chan’s board「Determined」<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0109/>Ehehe, thank you~! Then, which car do you want, Rina-chan? Ruby will go with~.... maybe this hamster car. Because it’s cute with its flower ribbon.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0209/>I will.... go with this rabbit one. It has a rocket booster.... it seems fast. But first, unless you get used to the game itself, it’ll be hard to talk.... so let’s play a lot. I’ll start.... okay?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0109/>Yeah! Ruby won’t lose~!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
